document_title: What is immunodeficiency syndrome? Causes and symptoms
subsection_content: Immunodeficiency syndrome (Immune deficiency disorder) is a condition in which the body's immunity is impaired, leading to the body's inability to prevent and protect against attacks from microbial pathogens from external factors such as bacteria, viruses, mold, parasites...(1)

subsection_data:
hoi chung suy giam mien dich.json. What is immunodeficiency syndrome?
Immunodeficiency syndrome (Immune deficiency disorder) is a condition in which the body's immunity is impaired, leading to the body's inability to prevent and protect against attacks from microbial pathogens from external factors such as bacteria, viruses, mold, parasites...(1)
